column4: can someone tell me why they prefer ubuntu to kubuntu? i'm used to kubuntu but things just don't seem right when i switched to ubuntu
matter of preference. also most of the work done on ubuntu by the main group (stuff like restricted hardware manager) i believe are ubuntu-specific
i hear that. i feel kubuntu is getting shorted
mainly the kubuntu people have to duplicate much of the work done on ubuntu. sometimes they do a better job though (so they say)
